ABOUTNEWSISSUES

About Vital Signs

We are a bunch of people who work in and around the health sector and are in the early stages of getting a network together. Our main aim is to understand and support the struggles in our sector. We’re from different backgrounds in terms of work and organising, but share a perspective that in the end it is about working class control over the means for a healthy life, and that worker and patient control of healthcare is a step towards that. If you are interested, come to our next meeting, contact us at: vitalsignsmag@proton.me If you want to keep up-to-date, follow us on Twitter at: @healthworkersu1

Vital Signs: A Health Workers’ Magazine For a New Society

Site by Jack Kershaw.
